statements: DELETE FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci' AND materials = 'Marble';
DELETE FROM provenance WHERE collection_id IN (SELECT collection_id FROM collections WHERE collection_name = 'Modern Art Collection') AND sculpture_id = 2002;
DELETE FROM provenance WHERE current_owner = 'Museum of Modern Art';
DELETE FROM provenance WHERE current_owner = 'Museum of Modern Art';

DELETE FROM SculptureHistory
WHERE sculpture_id = 101 AND event_type = 'Restoration';

DELETE FROM Artists
WHERE birth_year < 1980 OR nationality = 'French';
